FuncDef:
The set split-resume command sets the slave chassis mode when both the inter-chassis control link and data link fail in virtual cluster scenarios.
The undo set split-resume command restores the default slave chassis mode.
By default, slave chassis mode is slave-reset.
Examples: Operation succeed, split resume mode is fast preemption.
ExtraInfo:
Usage Scenario
In virtual cluster scenarios, the slave chassis mode must be set to fast-preemption or slave-reset. When both the inter-chassis control link and data link fail, the slave chassis changes to a master chassis or boards in the slave chassis are reset.
If fast-preemption is specified, the slave chassis immediately changes to a master chassis.If slave-reset is specified, boards in the slave chassis are reset.

Precautions
In VS mode, this command is supported only by the admin VS.
